The basic q-learning agent¶

class agent.Agent(epsilon=1, start_q_table=None)¶

A basic q-learning agent for controlling the heating in a simulated building.

Parameters

  • epsilon – The epsilon value for the epsilon-greedy approach

  • start_q_table – If there is any, a previously learned q_table

basic_controller(number_time_steps)¶

Represents a very basic control mechanism that is used as baseline for comparision. It heats until T=T_max and then turns the heating off until T_min is reached

Parameters

number_time_steps –

Returns

train(number_episodes, number_time_steps)¶

Performs the training of the agent

Parameters

  • number_episodes – The number of episodes that should be performed

  • number_time_steps – The number of time_steps involved in training

Returns

Saves the historical temperatures, the q-table and the rewards as pickle files
